entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:40 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly sunny. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
